actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to authorize appropriations for an immigration emergency revolving fund.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to authorize appropriations for an immigration emergency revolving fund, to be established in the Treasury, to provide for increased Immigration and Naturalization Service enforcement activities and related State and local reimbursements. Prohibits fund withdrawals unless the President has determined an emergency exists and certified such fact to the appropriate congressional committees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to authorize appropriations for an immigration emergency revolving fund.
